blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = | pop_est_footnotes = }} Arcadia is a city of Florida in the United States. It is the county seat of DeSoto County. == References == Category:Cities in Florida Category:County seats in Florida Category:1886 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Florida
